intro: Aspidium pica, commonly known as the common water fern, is a species of aquatic fern belonging to the family Blechnaceae. It is characterized by its delicate, floating fronds that are typically less than 10 centimeters in length. Aspidium pica plays a role in aquatic ecosystems by providing habitat for small aquatic organisms.
